docs.text: Getting started User Onboarding This is the sign-up page for users and influencers to start off with influencer-talk Users can sign up using their phone number/E-mail ID, entering their Full Name and password They can also choose to authenticate using their Google Account Incase, they already have an account they can also Login into their account using their Phone Number/E-mail ID or Google Account Home Page Home page consists of a list of available influencers that users can connect with Users can message with their favourite influencer by clicking on the Chat Button View profile button is ued view the influencer's profile Chats Page The chats page contains all the recent conversations of the user with the influencers Profile Details Page The profile page contains the profile information of the user information The user can click on the edit icon to make changes to any of their perosnal information or change their profile picture
docs.title: Getting started

docs.text: This is the sign-up page for users and influencers to start off with influencer-talk Users can sign up using their phone number/E-mail ID, entering their Full Name and password They can also choose to authenticate using their Google Account Incase, they already have an account they can also Login into their account using their Phone Number/E-mail ID or Google Account
docs.title: User Onboarding

docs.text: Home page consists of a list of available influencers that users can connect with Users can message with their favourite influencer by clicking on the Chat Button View profile button is ued view the influencer's profile
docs.title: Home Page

docs.text: The chats page contains all the recent conversations of the user with the influencers
docs.title: Chats Page

docs.text: The profile page contains the profile information of the user information The user can click on the edit icon to make changes to any of their perosnal information or change their profile picture
docs.title: Profile Details Page

docs.text: Purchasing Credits Credits Credits are our app's currency. Everything in the app is paid through credits . Obtaining Credits Click on the Credits or coin like icon at the top of the home screen. Tapping on this icon will take the user to the credits shop . Clicking on any of the credit option will direct users to the payment page. Here, users can pay using the payment method of their choice. Transaction History Tapping on this icon will take the user to the transaction history made by the user.
docs.title: Purchasing Credits

docs.text: Credits are our app's currency. Everything in the app is paid through credits .
docs.title: Credits

docs.text: Click on the Credits or coin like icon at the top of the home screen. Tapping on this icon will take the user to the credits shop . Clicking on any of the credit option will direct users to the payment page. Here, users can pay using the payment method of their choice.
docs.title: Obtaining Credits

docs.text: Tapping on this icon will take the user to the transaction history made by the user.
docs.title: Transaction History

docs.text: Utilities Settings Menu Clicking on the side menu button on the home page will navigate the user to the Setings Menu . Edit Details User can change their Name, Gender and Age Settings User can change App notification and Update preferences Account Settings Contains user options for the account like changing email address, phone number and updating password The contact us option contains the helps user contact support Using the Register as an influencer button, the user can register themselves as an influencer on the app The user can also delete their account using the Delete Your Account option Notification Settings User can change the settings of alerts and notifcations of the app using this menu Privacy Policy User can read on the app usage privacy policy and terms and conditions for using the app App Info Contains information about the application Support Users can view their existing tickets using the support button They can also raise a new ticket, by filling out a form and adding any reference images Log Out Users can log out of the application using this button
docs.title: Utilities

docs.text: Clicking on the side menu button on the home page will navigate the user to the Setings Menu .
docs.title: Settings Menu

docs.title: Log Out

docs.text: Influencer Onboarding Login as a User To register as an Influencer, first login as a normal user. Navigate to home page and click on the 3 dot menu near the coin icon at the top. Click on my account . Click on Register as an Influencer. Phone number verification click on Update now Enter your phone number and tap Continue . wait for otp verification. Enter the otp and click verify . Exit to the previous screen and click Register as an Influencer again. Entering relevant details. Enter the required details. Identity verification and supporting documents. Here , users can upload their identity documents to support their verification process. Our onboarding representatives will get in touch with to user to assist in this process.
docs.title: Influencer Onboarding

docs.text: To register as an Influencer, first login as a normal user. Navigate to home page and click on the 3 dot menu near the coin icon at the top. Click on my account . Click on Register as an Influencer.
docs.title: Login as a User

docs.text: click on Update now Enter your phone number and tap Continue . wait for otp verification. Enter the otp and click verify . Exit to the previous screen and click Register as an Influencer again.
docs.title: Phone number verification

docs.text: Enter the required details.
docs.title: Entering relevant details.

docs.text: Here , users can upload their identity documents to support their verification process. Our onboarding representatives will get in touch with to user to assist in this process.
docs.title: Identity verification and supporting documents.

docs.text: Connecting with Influencers Influencer Profile Navigate to the home page and tap view profile . Click on Chat to initiate a conversation with the influencer. Video call and Voice call requests To initiate a voice/video call request click on the call icon near the top. This will initiate a popup near the bottom. Click on a desired option. Select duration. This will trigger a request to the influencer. After the request is approved , click on the call icon again and initiate a video call. A Notification is displayed while the call on ongoing. Call charges Charges for call are based on duration. xyz credits/ min . After a call total charges for that session are displayed in the chat history. The same can be observed via payment history page. Rating Influencers Users can rate influencers by tapping the icon next to call on top of chats page. Notifications and alerts Chat notification. Call request notification. Incoming call notification. Missed call notification. A history of notifications can be viewed on the notification page. To access, tap the bell icon on the home page.
docs.title: Connecting with Influencers

docs.text: Navigate to the home page and tap view profile . Click on Chat to initiate a conversation with the influencer.
docs.title: Influencer Profile

docs.text: Influencers Docs Profile Navigate to the home page and tap view profile . An influencer can change their profile details, update their social handles, and their connection charges They can also change their profile photo and edit or add their featured video Featured Videos Influencers can edit featured videos from their profile page by clicking on the edit icon on the top right They can add by clicking on the plus icon at the botton right and remove the featured videos on their profile Influencer Collabs Click on Chat to initiate a conversation with the influencer. Clicking on Collabs can intiate a collab request with another influencer Requests page Influencers can view and respond to all requests at one page. Earnings Influencers can view their earnings and related stats. They can adjust the days as update bank details as well.
docs.title: Influencers Docs

docs.text: Navigate to the home page and tap view profile . An influencer can change their profile details, update their social handles, and their connection charges They can also change their profile photo and edit or add their featured video
docs.title: Profile

docs.title: Featured Videos
